timeline.bodyText:
log.trace and others will just log a message, and not the full stacktrace, if there's only one parameter. You need something like:
log.trace("ACL name is null", new NuxeoException("trace"));
timeline.author: efge

timeline.message: NXP-29833: log and set null ACL names

timeline.author: kevinleturc

timeline.bodyText:
You're not giving a null name by doing that as the default constructor gives LOCAL_ACL as name.
Furthermore, it can make sense to capture the logs and check that the debug log ACL name is null is written.
timeline.author: kevinleturc
